subheading: DiduxWallet is a free, client-side interface helping you interact with the Didux blockchain. Our easy-to-use, open-source platform allows you to generate wallets, interact with smart contracts, and so much more.
obtainAddress: Obtain a XD address and generate your private key. Saving and safekeeping the key will be your responsibility.
accessMyWalletDesc: Send or swap your XD and tokens, interact with smart contracts, and more! This is where the magic happens.
aboutSubheading: DiduxWallet puts the Didux blockchain at your fingertips. Originally developed by the excellent MEW team: a team of crypto-enthusiasts dedicated to bring you the most secure, most intuitive, and dare we say prettiest way to manage your crypto tokens. We're always here to help, and we're never giving away crypto. Cheers!
aboutMewWalletDesc: Access the Didux blockchain's original and most-trusted wallet client, now with a host of new features all contained in an elegant, easy-to-use interface.
aboutHardwareWalletDesc: DiduxWallet offers support for all major hardware wallets including Ledger, Trezor, and many more.
aboutSwapDesc: MEW has partnered with Bity, Kyber Network, Changelly, and Simplex to allow users to swap fiat to crypto, ETH and BTC, ETH and ERC-20.
aboutMewConnectDesc: DiduxWallet's companion app brings hardware-wallet style security to your iOS or Android smartphone, helping you to secure your funds as never before.
faqsSubheading: Have not found the question that you are looking for?
socialSubheading: Get in the know and see your balance grow (we hope)!
howToCreateWalletTitle: How do I create a new wallet?
howToCreateWalletDesc: DiduxWallet offers three ways to create a new XD wallet. These are via DIDUXconnect, Keystore file, or Mnemonic phrase.
whatIsMewConnectDesc: DIDUXconnect is our companion mobile app for DiduxWallet. We call it a hardware wallet without all the hardware. Now available for all Android and iOS smartphones!
workingWOtherWalletsTitle: Can DiduxWallet work with other wallets?
workingWOtherWalletsDesc: DiduxWallet supports many different wallet types including hardware wallets, such as the Ledger Nano S or Trezor, and wallets like DiduxWallet-extension. We are also open for anyone to use their Didux wallets with the appropriate information.
howToSendTxTitle: How can I send a transaction?
howToSendTxDesc: DiduxWallet lets anyone with a balance of XD send a transaction, without additional charges.
forgotPasswordPrivKeyTitle: I forgot my password/private key! What can I do?
forgotPasswordPrivKeyDesc: DiduxWallet does not offer support to recover or reset passwords/private keys. We always suggest writing down private keys and passwords on physical paper/notebooks for safekeeping. Maybe you saved it on your computer!
